sentences.en: Be particularly fastidious about washing your hands before touching food.
sentences.cn: 接触食物前尤其对洗手不能有半点马虎。

sentences.en: Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
sentences.cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。

sentences.en: Haven’t I met you before somewhere?
sentences.cn: 我以前在哪儿见过你吗？

sentences.en: He was bailed to appear before local magistrates on 5 November.
sentences.cn: 他获得保释，将于11月5日在地方法庭出庭受审。

sentences.en: He was hauled before the managing director and fired.
sentences.cn: 他被叫去见总裁，然后就被解雇了。

sentences.en: His inspiration to fly came even before he joined the Army.
sentences.cn: 他想开飞机的念头在参军之前就有了。

sentences.en: I heard them coming, crashing through the undergrowth, before I saw them.
sentences.cn: 还没看到他们，我便听到他们穿过矮树丛过来的声音。

sentences.en: I lived there once myself, before I got married.
sentences.cn: 我结婚前曾独自在那儿住过。

sentences.en: I saw her a few days before she died.
sentences.cn: 她去世的前几天我见过她。

sentences.en: Larry arrived home before me.
sentences.cn: 拉里在我之前到家。

sentences.en: Let’s meet at our house before the show.
sentences.cn: 看演出前在我们家碰头吧。

sentences.en: Never before had he seen so many people starving.
sentences.cn: 他以前从未见过这么多的人在挨饿。

sentences.en: Other students joined in the protest, and before long (=  soon  ) there was a crowd of 200 or so.
sentences.cn: 其他学生也加入了抗议队伍，不久就有200人左右了。

sentences.en: Say goodbye before you go.
sentences.cn: 你走之前要告别。

sentences.en: She checked the seating arrangements before the guests filed into the dining-room.
sentences.cn: 在客人们鱼贯进入餐厅之前，她核实了一遍座位安排。

sentences.en: She looked just the same as before.
sentences.cn: 她看上去就和以前一样。

sentences.en: The Koran recommends fasting as a penance before pilgrimages.
sentences.cn: 《古兰经》劝告人们在朝圣前斋戒，以作为一种补赎。

sentences.en: The new road should be completed before the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 这条新公路应该在年底前完工。

sentences.en: They were anxious to bring the washing in before it rained.
sentences.cn: 他们急于在下雨前把洗好的衣服收进屋子。

sentences.en: This show, too, was virtually sold out before it opened.
sentences.cn: 这场演出的门票也是几乎在开演前就销售一空了。

sentences.en: Vacuum-packed ham slices should be unwrapped 30 minutes before serving.
sentences.cn: 真空包装的火腿片应在食用前30分钟把包装除去。

sentences.en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
sentences.cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

sentences.en: We can now talk openly about AIDS which we couldn't before.
sentences.cn: 现在我们能公开谈论以前讳言不提的艾滋病问题。

sentences.en: We only got back from Scotland the day before yesterday (=  two days ago  ) .
sentences.cn: 我们前天才从苏格兰回来。

sentences.en: You have to pay your outstanding bill before joining the scheme.
sentences.cn: 在参加该项目之前必须结清余账。

trans.tran_en: earlier than a particular event or action
earlier than a particular event or action

trans.tran_cn: 在…之前， 在…前面，比…重要
